--- Scattershot / Afterburner ---

Scattershot just comes out of deep though, having ignored Strafe's 
incessant whining for long enough. "I don't know, lets check with 
Pacifix." He tries to open a comm, but find that his communication 
system has failed unexpectedly. "Strafe, lets find Pacifix." He 
starts off trying to find Pacifix, motioning for Strafe to follow. 

Afterburner, who has been getting mad at the bulk that is 
Lightspeed, decides to stop this annoyance. He pushes 
Lightspeed away from him.


On 28 Jun 2001, at 11:24, robertdahl wrote:

> Strafe looks at the scanner next to Scattershot. "We got boggies sir,
> boggies coming in fast, boggies with weaponry, boggies named
> Slugslinger, and Needlenose. Should we transform and intercept the
> boggies?" He asked for the third time. Lightspeed kept falling into
> Afterburner, suprised at the solidity of him for not posting.
>
